column4: is there an ftp server installed on Ubuntu Server Edition by default? That way i could get the files of my website on the server. I wouldn't know how else to get them there. I checked out the website [aw] gave, but it does not explain how to get generally get around with Ubuntu Server Edition. As a matter of fact i find it quite difficult to find any recources at all regarding this.
there's a full guide about configuring vsftpd here: https://help.ubuntu.com/8.10/serverguide/C/ftp-server.html
